title: Governors Island National Monument: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Field Trips History comes alive on Governors Island! Bring your class to explore the historic fortifications of the National Monument and learn about the island's storied past from National Park rangers! All Field Trips       Field Trips on Governors Island Learn More     Traveling Trunks Packed with primary source documents, maps, historic replica objects, and more, our Traveling Trunks are a ready-made and easy way to make New York City and U.S. history tangible to students. All Traveling Trunks       Borrow a Traveling Trunk! Learn More
